choices.text:
Below is an instruction that describes a task. Write a response that appropriately completes the request.

### Instruction: Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company

### Response:

Dear [Boss's Name],
I wanted to take this opportunity to inform you of a personal decision that has led me to make the choice of leaving the company. This was not an easy call for me, but I believe it is in my best interest at this time.
